item.title: Composer for modern WordPress development: Why and how
item.author: hello@ceceppa.me (Alessandro Senese)
item.description: As a WordPress developer, I do often rely on Composer libraries to easily manage CPTs, Settings, Infinite scroll, API integration, and much more‚Ä¶ Composer is a tool for dependency management in PHP. It allows you to declare the dependent libraries your project needs and it will install them in your project for you. getcomposer.org Beautiful definition, but what does it mean? We can see Composer like a kind of npm but for the PHP world, and like npm, it allows you to easily install, update and remove 3rd party libraries, or publishing your own private/public ones.

item.title: Anima
item.author: hello@ceceppa.me (Alessandro Senese)
item.description: Tired of wrestling with complex animation code in Godot? Anima is here to rescue you. I’ve created this powerful add-on to streamline the process of crafting captivating UI animations. With over 89 pre-built animations and 33 easing options at your fingertips, you can effortlessly bring your UI to life. From simple fades to intricate sequences, Anima offers unparalleled flexibility and control. Forget about the hassle of traditional animation methods ‚Äì Anima empowers you to focus on creativity, not code.

item.title: React Native AMA
item.author: hello@ceceppa.me (Alessandro Senese)
item.description: I created AMA to address the challenges developers often face when building accessible mobile apps. By providing a comprehensive suite of components, hooks, and guidelines, AMA simplifies the process of ensuring your app is usable by everyone. I believe that accessibility should be a priority for every developer, and AMA is my contribution to making that a reality. Documentation Source Code
